name: Space Monkeys
description:
Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game including 12 challenging levels wherein players must figure out how to conquer unique obstacles, enemies, and environments in zero-gravity, with bananas and head-banging music as your only motivation to carry on.

You play as one of countless test-monkeys sent to an evil space station for unethical evaluation where only the best of the best will survive, as players must:
• Survive space-junk, deadly robots, turrets, and lasers...
• Navigate the space station in zero-gravity with precision and finesse...
• Collect bananas to progress through the station...
• And unleash their inner ape in the face of danger.

Will you face the challenge and be the first monkey to escape?
